credit_line: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
title: Design for Brocaded Woven Hanging with Menorah
description: Field divided into rectangles of white and silver and white.  In upper right corner, a seven-branched menorah in brown and yellow.  In lower right corner, Hebrew characters for Israel "Yisrael" inscribed twice.
name: Drawing
